testcase.name: BaccaratCard objects can be compared & ordered
Cards dealt correctly from unshuffled Shoe

testcase.name: BaccaratHand has the correct string representation
BaccaratCard has the correct string representation
BaccaratCard objects can be tested for equality
Correct detection of whether a BaccaratHand is a 'natural'
